message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $12,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Hi Alice, I understand your position.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $15,000? That seems fair to both of us.
